features: 【1.7" Full-touch Screen & Customizable Watch Face】- Equipped with a 1.7-inch LCD screen, the smart watch provides you with a high-quality visual and interactive experience. Five levels of brightness options make it easy to view in a variety of lighting conditions. In addition, there are several watch faces for you to choose from in our "FitCloudPro" app, or you can customize a unique watch face with your favorite image

【Advanced Health Features】- With our smartwatch, you can monitor your heart rate,blood oxygen (SpO2), and your deep and light sleep status in real-time to help you better understand your health condition and adjust your lifestyle rationally. You can view your status summary in the APP

【Your Fitness Companion】- Fitness tracker supports 20 exercise modes (walking, running, cycling, yoga, basketball, etc.), which can help you understand your physical state when exercising and is ideal for your workout. In addition, it can accurately record the activities throughout the day, such as the number of steps walked, distance traveled and calories burned

【Wide Compatibility & Long Battery Life】- With a large capacity battery, it only takes 1.5 hours on a single charge. This smart watch is compatible with iO S 8.0, Android 4.4 and above smartphones and meets the IP67 waterproof rating, so you don't have to worry about wearing it while swimming or sweating during sports

【Your Smart Assistant】- This android smart watch includes more useful features, fitness tracker, pedometer, heart rate monitor, sleep monitor, 20 exercise modes, blood oxygen monitor, call notifications, SMS, and APP messages (note: you cannot reply to messages through the watch), music and camera controls, weather display, sedentary and water reminders, stopwatch, timer, calculator, alarm clock, etc. Meet your daily needs

【What You Get 】- Smart watch*1, watch band*1, charger*1, user manual*1, 180-day warranty. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us"

productInformation.name: Whats in the box
productInformation.value: Smart watch*1, charger*1, watch band*1, user manual*1

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 24-hour Heart Rate Monitoring Automatically monitor your heart rate in 24 hours and continually monitor the change of heart rate; According to the change of heart rate, it can clearly calculate the calorie burning, let you manage your fitness and relaxation more effectively. Blood Oxygen Monitor You can immediately use Smart Watch detect your blood oxygen saturation and adjust your body status,and provide you with guidance, optimize training and health trends, so that you can easily make training plans. Health Reminder Sedentary reminder: smart watch can remind you go and move every per hour. Water Drinking reminder: you can choose reminder interval from 30-180 minutes.Help you manage your health easily.

Sleep monitor Wear a smartwatch when you sleep to monitor your sleep status throughout the entire process. By analyzing your deep sleep, light sleep, and waking time, you can learn more about your sleep quality and help you provide a healthier way of sleeping. Weather Information When the watch is connected to the app "FitCloudPro", the weather is synchronized with your phone. Note: Getting accurate weather data requires visiting the "FitCloudPro" app every three hours to update the weather data. Music Control The music control can help you control the music through the smart watch，so you can listen to music while exercising.Control your music and switch songs easily with your smartwatch, no need to take your phone out of your pocket.

Stopwatch/time This watch supports stopwatch and timer functions,You can set a timer with a preset duration on the watch, and the timer will remind you when the timer expires,it can help you better optimize your workout and training. Alarm Clock You can set an alarm clock ring time in the "FitCloudPro" App. When the time is up, the watch will vibrate to remind you that you will not miss important things at any time. Remote Photography Free your hands and record beautiful moments. Just open the App on your smart phone and find the shake camera function to take a photo by shaking your smart watch.

------------------------------------------FAQ---------------------------------- Q、Can this watch answer calls and send messages? No,This watch only has caller ID, call rejection and message notification functions. Q、How to use the watch message reminder function? 1.Please ensure the permissions of App, messages, calls, etc. are allowed when you download the FitCloudPro app for the first time. 2.Allow FitCloudPro app to send notifications: Open your phone settings --> find "FitCloudPro" app --> notifications --> click "Allow notifications" --> check the lock screen/notification center/banner, check the "Always (default)" in the display preview. 3、In your "FitcloudPro" APP, enter the [Device] page---->click the [Push Notifications] --->open the[Enable All Reminder], and you can also choose the APP message reminder you need to open. *Note:The watch won't receive any notification if messages/calls/SMS notifications didn't appear on dropdown of your phone, make sure they are able to show up: Phone Settings-->Notifications> Find the app you need to get notification from-->Allow Notifications. In the App: authorize the watch to receive messages. Do not enable Do Not Disturb mode. Q、How to measure my heart rate & steps more accurately? 1.Please make sure your personal info(age,height,weight) in FitCloudPro app are filled in correctly. 2.For a single measurement on the watch, please wear the watch one finger wide below the wrist bone, snug but comfortable on your wrist. Then keep stay still and breathing peacefully. It needs more time to measure more accurate data.This is normal that the heart rate data will be volatile at start. You will find that the data will be more accurate, if you measure more times and test longer. 3.This watch counts steps by a built-in 3D gravity sensor, and the step counting result is affected by the user's swinging arm posture, stride length, body type, road level or slope, and other factors. The step counting data of our watch will not exceed 10% error from the actual. Q. How to set the weather on the watch? 1. The weather on the watch will be updated automatically. You must enable the relevant permissions in the APP and turn on the [Weather Push] function. The watch will automatically capture the weather information on the phone, and capture the weather information every 3 hours. Q: How to set watch language and time? 1. The default language of the smart watch is English, you can click [Settings] --- >[Language] on the watch, there are 10 languages in total, slide to select the language you need. 2. When your watch is connected to the mobile phone via Bluetooth, it will automatically synchronize the time of the mobile phone. You can set "12-hour format, 24-hour format and follow the system three mode.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My daughter has been asking me for a smart watch/fitness tracker. This one is great quality and is a pretty watch. Just got it and it was easy to set up for her. I think it's worth every penny. She will love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works like most smart watches. You can hook your phone up as well for messages. The time and date format was my only complaint setting it up, download fitcloudpro app from the play store or apple. I have an android phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars value for money
reviews.reviewText: its totally worth the price.. nd very easy to use!! first get it complete chrged then use it.. the battery usage is upto 48 hours

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Overall amazing watch!
reviews.reviewText: I've been hunting for a smart watch that's affordable and good quality and this one is definitely it! So easy to set up. Very comfortable to wear and the band has a ton of adjustments to fit any size wrist. There are a ton of watch faces to choose from. The fitness tracking works wonderfully as well as tracking sleep, heart rate, and o2 levels. Definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The watch looked great but I had an issue with trying to register the watch on fitcloudpro to Bluetooth to phone using QR scan and credit card as registration as required by app for free with the Norton symbol and check mark and all only to find out that I was charged $39.97 for an escort service and not free as stated. I also bought another watch, a different brand but another smart watch (uaue) and did the same as the other. The escorts services aren't the only charges resulting in multiple charges in different amounts causing me to close credit cards and go through the process of getting new cards and accounts. Totally not worth it. Sending both back and will purchase fitness watches elsewhere like a sporting goods store like Dickson, Academy or other

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected!
reviews.reviewText: I recently got a smartwatch and my kids have been dying for me to get them one too, but I wasn't about to fork over that much money, so I took a shot on this and for what we're looking for it more than does the job. It actually pleasantly surprised me!The setup and connection was simple, and hassle free. The battery life is solid, and I love that it motivates them to be more active!Now we just need to deal with who's turn it is for the watch lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Every mom needs this thing!!
reviews.reviewText: I cannot recommend this smart watch enough!! The fact that it has a phone finder function is truly a time saver. As a mom with 2 young children I'm constantly misplacing my phone. Love that function. The price point is wonderful. It does everything I feel like the expensive watches do for half the cost. Its lightweight on your wrist, you forget it's there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Work's really well for the price.
reviews.reviewText: It works really well for the price, nice to be able to look at your messages without taking your phone out of your pocket. App works with lot of messaging services. Have been using it Whatsapp. Has lot of cool watch faces. Can monitor heart rate. Can track multiple sports. No audio capability or replying to messages on the watch. Can be charged via laptop or any existing charger.

reviews.reviewTitle: This is a good gift for my mother
reviews.reviewText: I got this as a Mother’s Day gift for my mother who is old and I want to monitor her health. This fitness/smart watch is surprisingly nice and works extremely well. First impressions, looks smart, nice clear glass screen with a single button on the side to depress when selecting from the touch screen. The strap is a lightweight silicone in pink but is detachable if you wish to replace. The only slight criticism at this point is the button on the side presses in and rotates but the rotation has no functionality. It would be great if you could scroll using the turning dial. Oh well, it is very cheap ,lol The overall set up was simple. Download the FitCloudPro app, follow the on screen or manual installation and within minutes it's all connected and you can receive emails, texts, weather information. You can monitor your heart rate, blood pressure, blood oxygen, sleep, and it is also able to count your steps and sports information. There are many screen items to select for you , and you can arrange the items you want to watch on your watch face. This smart watch supports multiple language , like English, French, Chinese, etc. You can also change the digital display to suit yourbown style. For the money I am genuinely very pleased and as its a gift I know my mother will be happy with it. I would recommend for anyone looking for a budget fitness / smart watch. Oh and the battery last for ever!

reviews.reviewTitle: A Smartwatch That Perfectly Blends Fashion and Technology
reviews.reviewText: As someone who values both fashion and technology, I have been on the lookout for a smartwatch that seamlessly combines the two. This smartwatch boasts a sleek and stylish design, crafted with high-quality materials and impeccable attention to detail. Its rounded dial and refined wristband exude a sense of sophistication and charm.Beyond its exceptional design, this smartwatch offers an array of impressive features. It not only displays the time and serves as an alarm clock, but it also monitors my steps, heart rate, sleep quality, and other health data. Furthermore, it incorporates smart notification capabilities, allowing me to stay up-to-date with the latest messages and updates from my phone, regardless of where I am. Additionally, it supports activity tracking modes, GPS positioning, and more, enabling me to better understand my performance and progress during workouts.

I’m kind of regretting why I didn’t update my watch any time sooner. I’ve been using name brand fitness band for years. Apple Watch is way out of my budget so I just gave a try to this generic one. It’s great and everything I need is in this watch. (See the picture). Time, date, steps, distance, calories, and weather even when I’m working indoor. Easy to sync and most I love is the price. So affordable but still very functional.

Really love it, the design, color, light weight, and screen size are perfect. Simple to set up. It can monitor your activities, heart rate, blood pressure, blood oxygen, sleep mode, and more. It will notify incoming calls, messages, and emails (need to set up in the app), so I don't have to worry about missing anything if my phone isn't on me. The 'find phone' and weather feature are very handy. Definitely recommend.

My friend recommended this product when he knew that I wanted a smartwatch. When I got it, I would like to say it is exactly like my friend said. It is easy to set up and has many great watch faces to select from the app, along with a long-lasting battery. Moreover, it can also show notifications from my iPhone, which is a really nice function to me. I recommend this watch to anyone in need of a smartwatch.
